xldoc.name: directories
xldoc.title: The X-Logic.org Directory Structure
xldoc.description: Overview of the X-Logic site following the directory structure (for completeness, including work in progress and other rubbish).
xldoc.author: rbj

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Since there are many ways of navigating the X-Logic site, it can sometimes be hard to find things. This document heads a comprehensive hierarchy which follows the directory structure, which will normally reach everything on the site.

section.title: Miscellaneous Documents
section.abstract: Some documents whose directories don't yet have an index.

sbcol.subsec: A schema for the XML namespace used for the X-Logic site.
